mapper.update: UPDATE approval SET app_status = 2 WHERE app_no = ( SELECT DISTINCT app_no FROM app_agree WHERE (SELECT count(*) FROM app_agree WHERE agr_status in (2) and app_no = #{app_no}) = (select count(*) FROM app_agree WHERE app_no = #{app_no}) and app_no = #{app_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.app_date, a.app_title, e.emp_name, a.app_status FROM approval a, employee e, app_request arq WHERE e.emp_no = arq.emp_no and arq.app_no = a.app_no and arq.emp_no = #{emp_no}
